growth_drivers: Increasing demand for high-performance, eco-friendly sealant solutions

customer_pain_points: Need for specialized sealing and caulking expertise rather than generalist contractors
Compliance with Finnish building regulations and environmental standards
Performance under extreme Nordic climate conditions (temperature fluctuations, moisture, freeze-thaw cycles)

Quality assurance and long-term warranty requirements

Demand for sustainable and eco-friendly construction materials
Integration of new sealing technologies and materials
Higher quality standards and warranty expectations
